name: The Divergent Series: Insurgent: From Divergent To Insurgent
detailed_description: Join the cast and filmmakers as they take a look back at the story that started it all, bridging earlier events to the aftermath of Insurgent in this Divergent refresher course.
about_the_game: Join the cast and filmmakers as they take a look back at the story that started it all, bridging earlier events to the aftermath of Insurgent in this Divergent refresher course.
